summary: My favorite part of working is interacting with people. I love delivering excellent customer service and creating the best experience for customers. My experiences have shown that a call or store visit can be more worthwhile, turning tedious tasks into positive experiences and fostering loyal customers. I have primarily worked in call centers with some experience in sales and store customer service.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Attended customers with Medicare RX plans and Medicare Advantage Plans; bilingual in Spanish; proficient in reading and writing in English and Spanish; provided information on billing, health and dental benefits, quoting benefits and enrollments.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Provided accurate and appropriate information in response to customer inquiries; demonstrated mastery of customer service call script within specified timeframes; improved customer ratings.

experience.title: Customer Service
experience.description: Answered billing inquiries for home and auto insurance; set up non-payment cancellation arrangements; applied payments and resolved billing issues.

experience.title: Customer Service
experience.description: Spoke to clients about retirement plans and products like 401(k)s and annuities; maintained up-to-date records; built customer loyalty with follow-up calls.

experience.title: Agent
experience.description: Represented Nationwide as a licensed Customer Service Agent; performed quotes and changes to auto and home insurance policies; directed inbound calls to improve call flow.

experience.title: Floor Sales Associate
experience.description: Enhanced customer service by interacting with customers to identify needs; boosted sales by suggesting alternatives and leveraging weekly sale.

experience.title: Healthcare Provider
experience.description: Helped patients with daily activities, transportation and medication administration; documented patient status; prepared meals according to prescribed diets.

experience.title: Healthcare Provider
experience.description: Cared for a mentally and physically disabled adult; provided transport; documented client records; communicated with parents and company.
